text: Tatyana Miloserdova (born 9 January 1960) is a Russian-born equestrian, who has been representing Italy since 2019. She competed in the individual dressage event at the 2008 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1960 births Category:Living people Category:Italian female equestrians Category:Russian female equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of Russia Category:Equestrians at the 2008 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Moscow
title: Tatyana Miloserdova
